item.title: On Learning
item.description: Choose your content. Some material not worth the effort. Learning comes from repetition, but sometimes you just don’t care whether you’ll remember what you’ve read. But even if you don’t remember the specifics, the effect on your model of the world persists. As your mental model evolves, re-reading books is beneficial because the material compiles differently. When reading, annotate connections from previous knowledge, unanswered questions and unjustified assumptions. Make flashcards of facts/quotes that you wish to analyze.
